anomaly_lib.machine_learning package#

Submodules#

anomaly_lib.machine_learning.decision_tree_classifier module#

class anomaly_lib.machine_learning.decision_tree_classifier.DecisionTreeClassifierClassOD(hyperparameter: dict, x_train: array, y_train: array, x_test: array = None, y_test: array = None)#

Bases: AlgorithmBase

fit()#

Fit detector. Adjusts the DecisionTreeClassifier model using the training data.

Returns:

The outlier scores of the training data [0,1].

load_model(path_model)#

Loads the DecisionTreeClassifier model from the specified file.

Args:

  • path_model (str): Path of the file where the model is located.

predict()#

Predict whether a particular sample is an outlier or not. Adjusts the DecisionTreeClassifier model using the test data.

Returns:

Predict probability of outlier

save_model(path_model)#

Saves the DecisionTreeClassifier model to the specified file.

Args:

  • path_model (str): Path of the file where the model will be saved.

set_hyperparameter(hyperparameter)#

Sets the hyperparameters of the model.

Args:

  • hyperparameter (dict): A dictionary containing the hyperparameters of the model.
